snippet: Ethan Lipton, a singer and songwriter, has written a musical ode to unemployment called “No Place to Go,” which opens at Joe’s Pub on Wednesday.
abstract: Ethan Lipton's No Place to Go, a musical ode to unemployment directed by Leigh Silverman, opens at Joe’s Pub.
lead_paragraph: Ethan Lipton, a singer and songwriter, has written a musical ode to unemployment called “No Place to Go,” which opens at Joe’s Pub on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Ethan Lipton’s ‘No Place to Go,’ at Joe’s Pub
headline.main: All the Jobs Are Moving to Mars
headline.print_headline: All the Jobs Are Moving To Mars
